about_the_game:
Challenge a game with a rather surreal worldview in which the player becomes a mosquito and sucks girls blood!
Mosquito simulator is a prank game in the type of simulation and survival.
You controls a mosquito named "Mister Mosquito" who has taken up residency in the house of the girl, life-sized humans that serve as the protagonist's food source in the game. The goal of the game is to stock up on blood through the summer so that the mosquito will survive the winter ahead. You are tasked with sucking blood from specific body parts of the girls without being noticed.
The challenge in bloodsucking is that each girl has a "stress meter". You must make sure that the girl stays unaware. Sucking too fast or too slow will increase the girl's stress level. If Mister Mosquito is swatted while sucking blood, instant death occurs. If your are noticed by the girl while flying around, Battle Mode begins, played out like a boss battle. The girl tries to attack Mister Mosquito through various means. To calm her, the player must hit a number of pressure points, relieving them of tension. Once they are relaxed enough, they return to their business.
detailed_description:
Challenge a game with a rather surreal worldview in which the player becomes a mosquito and sucks girls blood!
Mosquito simulator is a prank game in the type of simulation and survival.
You controls a mosquito named "Mister Mosquito" who has taken up residency in the house of the girl, life-sized humans that serve as the protagonist's food source in the game. The goal of the game is to stock up on blood through the summer so that the mosquito will survive the winter ahead. You are tasked with sucking blood from specific body parts of the girls without being noticed.
The challenge in bloodsucking is that each girl has a "stress meter". You must make sure that the girl stays unaware. Sucking too fast or too slow will increase the girl's stress level. If Mister Mosquito is swatted while sucking blood, instant death occurs. If your are noticed by the girl while flying around, Battle Mode begins, played out like a boss battle. The girl tries to attack Mister Mosquito through various means. To calm her, the player must hit a number of pressure points, relieving them of tension. Once they are relaxed enough, they return to their business.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or Greater
  • Processor: x64 SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB memory（dedicated VRAM or shared RAM）, Graphics card with hader model 4.0 capabilities.
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 or Greater
  • Processor: Intel 64-bit or Apple silicon
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB memory（dedicated VRAM or shared RAM）, Graphics card with hader model 4.0 capabilities.
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

name: Mosquito Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Greater
  • Processor: x64 SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB memory（dedicated VRAM or shared RAM）, Graphics card with hader model 4.0 capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Mosquito simulator is a prank game in the type of simulation and survival.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
